function.name: openssl_get_privatekey
function.description: Gets private keys.

function.name: openssl_public_decrypt
function.description: Decrypts data with public key.

function.name: openssl_pkey_export
function.description: Gets an exportable representation of a key into a string or file.

function.name: openssl_seal
function.description: Seals data.

function.name: openssl_csr_export
function.description: Exports a CSR to file or a var.

function.name: openssl_pkey_export_to_file
function.description: Gets an exportable representation of a key into a file.

function.name: openssl_x509_export
function.description: Exports a CERT to file or a var.

function.name: openssl_csr_sign
function.description: Signs a cert with another CERT.

function.name: openssl_pkcs7_sign
function.description: Signs the MIME message in the file named infile with signcert/signkey and output the result to file name outfile. headers lists plain text headers to exclude from the signed portion of the message, and should include to, from and subject as a minimum.

function.name: openssl_csr_export_to_file
function.description: Exports a CSR to file or a var.

function.name: openssl_pkcs7_verify
function.description: Verifys that the data block is intact, the signer is who they say they are, and returns the CERTs of the signers.

function.name: openssl_pkcs7_decrypt
function.description: Decrypts the S/MIME message in the file name infilename and output the results to the file name outfilename. recipcert is a CERT for one of the recipients. recipkey specifies the private key matching recipcert, if recipcert does not include the key.

function.name: openssl_pkey_get_private
function.description: Gets private keys.

function.name: openssl_pkey_free
function.description: Frees a key.

function.name: openssl_error_string
function.description: Returns a description of the last error, and alters the index of the error messages. Returns false when the are no more messages.

function.name: openssl_public_encrypt
function.description: Encrypts data with public key.

function.name: openssl_csr_new
function.description: Generates a privkey and CSR.

function.name: openssl_x509_check_private_key
function.description: Checks if a private key corresponds to a CERT.

function.name: openssl_x509_checkpurpose
function.description: Checks the CERT to see if it can be used for the purpose in purpose. cainfo holds information about trusted CAs.

function.name: openssl_x509_parse
function.description: Returns an array of the fields/values of the CERT.

function.name: openssl_x509_read
function.description: Reads X.509 certificates.

function.name: openssl_open
function.description: Opens data.

function.name: openssl_x509_free
function.description: Frees X.509 certificates.

function.name: openssl_private_encrypt
function.description: Encrypts data with private key.

function.name: openssl_private_decrypt
function.description: Decrypts data with private key.

function.name: openssl_verify
function.description: Verifys data.

function.name: openssl_get_publickey
function.description: Gets public key from X.509 certificate.

function.name: openssl_pkcs7_encrypt
function.description: Encrypts the message in the file named infile with the certificates in recipcerts and output the result to the file named outfile.

function.name: openssl_free_key
function.description: Frees a key.

function.name: openssl_x509_export_to_file
function.description: Exports a CERT to file or a var.

function.name: openssl_pkey_new
function.description: Generates a new private key.

function.name: openssl_pkey_get_public
function.description: Gets public key from X.509 certificate.

function.name: openssl_sign
function.description: Signs data.
